original: sngar khyod kyis nga la gsol ba btab pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ci'i phyir gsungs zhes rtogs par byed pa dag gi phyir /
analyzed: sngar khyod kyis nga la gsol ba btab pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ci'i phyir gsungs zhes rtogs par byed pa dag gi phyir /
translated: In order to understand why you asked me to explain the recitation of the perfect name,

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Vajrapani, Vajradhara,

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says this and so forth.

original: su zhig gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: su zhig gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yin zhe na /
translated: Whose name is it that is being recited?

original: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku /
translated: The Bhagavat, the body of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
translated: The body of wisdom of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The wisdom being Manjusri.

original: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The body of wisdom is so called because it is the nature of pure wisdom.

original: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The body of wisdom of all the Tathagatas is so called because it is the essence of the Dharma body.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis ye shes kyi sems dpa' ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis ye shes kyi sems dpa' ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The wisdom being Manjusri is so called because he is the essence of all the wisdom beings, being the lord of the mandala.

original: de'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa de yang don dang yi ge yongs su dag pas na yongs su dag pa'o //üîΩma 'dres @290a * //
analyzed: de'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa de yang don dang yi ge yongs su dag pas na yongs su dag pa'o // ma 'dres @290a * //
translated: That recitation of his name is pure because it is pure in meaning and in letters.

original: pas na / thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: pas na / thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is uncommon because it is not shared with others.üîΩ It is supreme because it is the best of all recitations.

original: ci'i phyir 'di ston par mdzad ces rtogs par byed pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di ston par mdzad ces rtogs par byed pa la /
translated: Why does he teach this?üîΩOne should understand that he teaches this in order to generate in you

original: khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang / mgu ba chen po bla na med pa bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang / mgu ba chen po bla na med pa bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: great, unsurpassed joy, faith, and delight.

original: de la tha ma la can gyi tshul gyis yid dga' ba ni yid dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de la tha ma la can gyi tshul gyis yid dga' ba ni yid dga' ba'o //
translated: Therein, mental joy is mental satisfaction.

original: sems kyi rab tu dang ba'i mos pa'i khyad par gyis na dang ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rab tu dang ba'i mos pa'i khyad par gyis na dang ba'o //
translated: Faith is a special mental clarity due to a particular mental state.

original: de nyid rab kyi mthar thugs par song ba ni mgu ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid rab kyi mthar thugs par song ba ni mgu ba chen po'o //
translated: That itself, having gone to the highest limit, is great delight.

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang khyod kyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o zhes thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang khyod kyis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o zhes thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: O VajrapƒÅ·πái, O Vajradhara, you should explain this in order to purify the secret of body, speech, and mind. This should be applied to all.

original: de la lus kyi gsang ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bdud dang / mu stegs la sogs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar song ba'i lus ni lus kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de la lus kyi gsang ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bdud dang / mu stegs la sogs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar song ba'i lus ni lus kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret of the body is the body of the Tathagata, which is not common to the disciples, hermit buddhas, demons, or tirthikas, and which is present in the circle of the Tathagata's retinue.

original: de bzhin du dag gi gsang ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thun mong du gyur pa dang / gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngag gi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dag gi gsang ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thun mong du gyur pa dang / gzhan dag dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngag gi gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret of speech is the skill in teaching the Dharma, which is common to the Tathagatas and the bodhisattvas who are lords of the tenth stage, but not common to others.

original: de bzhin du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi spyod pa'i rjes su zhugs pas chos kyi longs spyod nyams su myong ba ni yid kyi gsang ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi spyod pa'i rjes su zhugs pas chos kyi longs spyod nyams su myong ba ni yid kyi gsang ba ste /
translated: The secret of mind is the experience of the enjoyment of Dharma by the mind-made body, which is engaged in the activities of the minds of all Tathagatas.

original: de ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba'i khyad par ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don rtogs pa las yongs su dag cing khyad par can du 'gyur bas de nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba'i khyad par ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don rtogs pa las yongs su dag cing khyad par can du 'gyur bas de nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the special secrets of body, speech, and mind are purified and become special through understanding the meaning of the Discourse of the Praise of the Good Qualities. Therefore, one should strive in that.üîΩThe ten stages and the ten perfections are not complete, and the accumulations of merit and wisdom are not pure.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag par bya ba dang zhes bya ba'i sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /üîΩbsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su ma dag pa dang dag par bya ba'i phyir bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag par bya ba dang zhes bya ba'i sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /üîΩbsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su ma dag pa dang dag par bya ba'i phyir bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The ten stages and the ten perfections are not complete, and the accumulations of merit and wisdom are not pure.

original: bla na med pa'i don ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mthong ba thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i bar gyi phyir zhes @290b bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yang dag par rtogs shing gzung bar bya ba'i phyir te
analyzed: bla na med pa'i don ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mthong ba thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin du ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i bar gyi phyir zhes @290b bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yang dag par rtogs shing gzung bar bya ba'i phyir te
translated: For those who have not realized the unsurpassed meaning, in order to cause them to realize it, means in order to cause them to realize the meaning of Buddhahood, in order to attain the vision of the powers, fearlessnesses, and so forth, and similarly, in order to uphold the way of the true Dharma of all Tathagatas, means in order to realize and uphold the perfection of wisdom and so forth.

original: / bshad pa ni gzhung tsam zhig bstan pa'o //
analyzed: / bshad pa ni gzhung tsam zhig bstan pa'o //
translated: Explanation is the mere teaching of the text.

original: yang dag par bstan pa ni gzhung gi don bshad pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan pa ni gzhung gi don bshad pa'o //
translated: Correct teaching is the explanation of the meaning of the text.

original: bkrol ba ni rnam grangs gzhan dag gis brda sprad pa'o //
analyzed: bkrol ba ni rnam grangs gzhan dag gis brda sprad pa'o //
translated: Unravelling is the communication through other categories.

original: rnam par phye ba ni rnam grangs kyi don gyi yul gyi rnam par dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba ni rnam grangs kyi don gyi yul gyi rnam par dbye ba nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: Analysis is the demonstration of the classification of the objects of the categories.

original: gsal bar byas pa ni shin tu yang gsal bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar byas pa ni shin tu yang gsal bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is made clear, because it is made very clear.

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la yang gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la yang gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: VajrapƒÅ·πái, Vajradhara, this has been empowered by me in your tantra through the empowerment of the reality of all mantras.

original: gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid thogs pa med pa'i nus pas bzung ba dang / bcad pa dang / ston pa'i nus pa phul du byung bar bskyed pas bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas zil gyis mi non pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid thogs pa med pa'i nus pas bzung ba dang / bcad pa dang / ston pa'i nus pa phul du byung bar bskyed pas bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas zil gyis mi non pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: The empowerment of the reality of all mantras is the power of unobstructed capacity to grasp, cut, and display, and the generation of the excellent power of the empowerment of the bodhisattvas by the buddhas is the empowerment that cannot be overwhelmed by demons, tƒ´rthikas, and so forth.

original: bstan par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstan par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is taught.

original: phan yon rnam pa mang po rnam grangs dpag tu med pa'i dbye bas bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: phan yon rnam pa mang po rnam grangs dpag tu med pa'i dbye bas bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the many benefits in terms of the divisions of the immeasurable enumerations,

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: VajrapƒÅ·πái, Vajradhara, moreover, it is said and so forth.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan du na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover means otherwise.

original: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba shin tu yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba shin tu yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: This recitation of the name is the purification and complete purification of the secret of body, speech, and mind of omniscient pristine awareness.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes te /
translated: Omniscient pristine awareness is the pristine awareness of all buddhas.

original: de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: That itself is the secret of body, speech, and mind.

original: shin tu kun nas yongs su dag cing byang ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shin tu kun nas yongs su dag cing byang ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Complete purification and complete cleansing is because there is no affliction together with its habitual tendencies.

original: de dag thams cad kyang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa las byung bas na de skad ces bshad do //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa las byung bas na de skad ces bshad do //
translated: Since all of those arise from realizing the essence of the recitation of the name, it is explained in that way.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa dang / 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa dang / 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
translated: The enlightenment of the buddhas is the cause and result of the essence of all the tathagatas.

original: rtogs pa dang lam phyin ci ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang lam phyin ci ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of the perfect buddhas is the nature of the path and the realization that is not mistaken.

original: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni slar mi ldog par gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni slar mi ldog par gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The sugatas are those who go without returning.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid la zhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: All the tathagatas are those who have entered suchness.

original: @291a * // chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa thugs su chud pa ni chos kyi dbyings la nan tan gyis sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: @291a * // chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa thugs su chud pa ni chos kyi dbyings la nan tan gyis sgrub pa po'o //
translated: The realization of the unsurpassed realm of phenomena is the one who accomplishes the realm of phenomena through practice.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyis bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud kyi stobs te /
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyis bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud kyi stobs te /
translated: The powers of the aggregates, afflictions, Lord of Death, and the son of heaven.

original: nus pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have overcome their power.üîΩThe power of all those who have the ten powers is the power of the ten powers.

original: stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do zhes bya ba ni bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa pha rol smra ba rnams kyi zil gyis mi non cing brdzi bar mi 'gyur ba'i stobs bcu po thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩthams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni shes bya ma lus pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do zhes bya ba ni bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa pha rol smra ba rnams kyi zil gyis mi non cing brdzi bar mi 'gyur ba'i stobs bcu po thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni shes bya ma lus pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Because they have all the ten powers that cannot be overcome or crushed by opponents such as Mara, tirthikas, and so forth.üîΩThe omniscient ones refers to those who have the wisdom that comprehends all objects of knowledge without exception.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par gyur pas so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par gyur pas so //
translated: Omniscience is the realization of all phenomena in all their aspects.

original: chos thams cad kyi lung ngo zhes bya ba ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos shis shing khong du chud pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi lung ngo zhes bya ba ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos shis shing khong du chud pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The scripture of all dharmas means that the Dharma of scripture and realization is auspicious and will be understood.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of all Buddhas means that they are perfectly generated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i skye gnas so zhes bya ba ni nye bar dmigs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i skye gnas so zhes bya ba ni nye bar dmigs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dri ma
translated: The stainless, very pure abode of the perfection of the merit and knowledge accumulations of all Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas means that it is stainless because it is free from the stain of conceptualization,

original: med pa'o // rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags med pas na shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'o // rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags med pas na shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: and very pure because it is free from the latent tendencies of conceptualization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs gnyis yin pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs gnyis yin pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Since it is the two accumulations of merit and knowledge of the Bodhisattvas, it is the perfection of the merit and knowledge accumulations.

original: thams cad du yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba brjed par mi bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad du yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba brjed par mi bya ste /
translated: And everywhere, the recitation of the true nature of the name itself is the cause and result.

original: 'di nyid kho na las skyes pa yin pas so //
analyzed: 'di nyid kho na las skyes pa yin pas so //
translated: This should not be forgotten, because it is born from this very thing.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhir gyur pa dang bskyed pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhir gyur pa dang bskyed pa'i gnas so //
translated: The field of all the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas is the basis and the place of origin.

original: lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'byor ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'byor ba'i gnas so //
translated: The excellence of all gods and men is the place of prosperity.

original: theg pa chen po'i gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po thams cad 'di nyid du rab tu gnas pas na theg pa chen po'i gzhi'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po thams cad 'di nyid du rab tu gnas pas na theg pa chen po'i gzhi'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The basis of the Mahayana is called the basis of the Mahayana because all the Mahayana is well established in it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi spyod pa ma lus pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu phyin ci ma @291b log par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi spyod pa ma lus pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu phyin ci ma @291b log par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The source of all the bodhisattva practices means that it is the unerring cause for the arising of all the practices of mantra and the practices of the perfections such as generosity.

original: 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyi mtha'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam gyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyi mtha'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam gyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The culmination of all the ƒÅrya paths means that it is the ultimate of the true paths.

original: rnam par grol ba rnams brtag pa'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su brtag pa'i gnas yin pas so //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba rnams brtag pa'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su brtag pa'i gnas yin pas so //
translated: The investigation of the liberations means that it is the basis of investigation.

original: nges par 'byung ba'i lam skye ba'i gnas so zhes bya ba ni theg pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba'i lam skye ba'i gnas so zhes bya ba ni theg pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The source of the arising of the path of definite emergence means that it is the collection of all the vehicles.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unbroken lineage of the tathƒÅgatas means that it is the unbroken generation of all bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun rab tu 'phel bar byed pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun rab tu 'phel bar byed pas so //
translated: It is the increase of the lineage and continuity of the great bodhisattvas, because it causes the continuity of the lineage of the bodhisattvas to increase from one to another.

original: pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan du khas 'che ba'i phyogs tshar gcod cing sun 'byin pa'i gnas thob pa bskyed pas so //
analyzed: pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan du khas 'che ba'i phyogs tshar gcod cing sun 'byin pa'i gnas thob pa bskyed pas so //
translated: It is the destruction of all adversaries, because it causes the attainment of the state of refutation and destruction of the positions of others.

original: mu stegs can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pas bdag tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa rnam par 'jig pas so //
analyzed: mu stegs can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pas bdag tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa rnam par 'jig pas so //
translated: It is the complete destruction of all non-Buddhists, because it causes the destruction of the attachment to self, etc., by teaching that all dharmas are without self.

original: bdud bzhi'i stobs kyi dpung dang sde pham par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i stobs kyi dpung dang sde pham par byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is the defeat of the hosts and armies of the powers of the four Maras.

original: stobs ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: stobs ni nus pa'o //
translated: Power is ability.

original: dbung ni blon po chen po rnams so //
analyzed: dbung ni blon po chen po rnams so //
translated: An army is the great ministers.

original: sde ni thams cad bsdus pa'i sde chen po ste /
analyzed: sde ni thams cad bsdus pa'i sde chen po ste /
translated: An army is a great collection of all.

original: sde zhes bya ba ni rnam par phye ba'o //
analyzed: sde zhes bya ba ni rnam par phye ba'o //
translated: An army is a division.

original: de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud bzhi po las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas phung po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'chi bdag dang / lha'i bu'i bdud bzhi po las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the cause for the complete victory over the four demons, i.e. the aggregates, the afflictions, death and the son of the gods.

original: sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyod pa thams cad ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don mthun pa dang / don spyod pa thams cad ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the perfect gathering of all sentient beings, because it is the essence of all generosity, agreeable speech, beneficent conduct and sameness of purpose.

original: nges par 'byung ba bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thobüîΩpar byed pas so //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thobüîΩpar byed pas so //
translated: It is the maturity of the path of all ƒÅryas who are destined for nirvƒÅ·πáa, because the eightfold noble path leads to the nirvƒÅ·πáa of the ≈õrƒÅvaka, the pratyekabuddha and the perfect buddha.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams kyi dpa' bar 'gro pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byed pas @292a * //üîΩna ting nge 'dzin to //üîΩsems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan bzhi po rnams te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams kyi dpa' bar 'gro pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byed pas @292a * // na ting nge 'dzin to // sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan bzhi po rnams te /
translated: It is concentration because it brings to completion the concentrations such as the heroic stride.üîΩThe meditative development of the four meditative absorptions is the meditative concentration of those whose minds are one-pointed.

original: de rnams bskyed pa ni de la gzhol ba'i sems su 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: de rnams bskyed pa ni de la gzhol ba'i sems su 'gyur bas so //
translated: The meditative development of the four meditative absorptions as previously described is the meditative concentration of those whose minds are one-pointed because their minds are directed towards them.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba la brtson pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i lam ni rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba la brtson pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i lam ni rnal 'byor te /
translated: The yoga of those who are intent on the restraint of body, speech and mind is the path which is the union of serenity and insight.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the yoga of those who are intent on the correct practice of body, speech and mind because it brings to completion all the yogas.

original: kun du sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni kun du sbyor ba dgu ste /
analyzed: kun du sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni kun du sbyor ba dgu ste /
translated: He is free from all fetters means that he is the antidote to all the fetters that were previously explained, such as the nine fetters.

original: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i kun du sbyor ba thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pas na bral ba'o zhes nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad dang nye ba'i nyonüîΩmongs pa sngar bshad pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i kun du sbyor ba thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pas na bral ba'o zhes nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sngar bshad pa ste /
translated: He is free from all the afflictions and secondary afflictions means that he abandons the ninety-eight afflictions and the secondary afflictions that were previously explained.

original: de thams cad spong ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa rtsa nas 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: de thams cad spong ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa rtsa nas 'byin pa'o //
translated: He abandons all of them means that he uproots them along with their latent tendencies.

original: sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams rnam la sna tshogs pas nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams rnam la sna tshogs pas nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: The pacification of all obscurations refers to the pacification of the obscurations of the mental afflictions, the obscurations of karma, and the obscurations to the knowable.

original: 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi 'ching ba dang / zhe sdang gi 'ching ba dang / gti mug gi 'ching ba ste /
analyzed: 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi 'ching ba dang / zhe sdang gi 'ching ba dang / gti mug gi 'ching ba ste /
translated: Liberation from all bonds refers to the bonds of attachment, the bonds of aversion, and the bonds of delusion.

original: 'ching ba thams cad dang bral bas na rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba thams cad dang bral bas na rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: Since it is free from all bonds, it is liberation.

original: rdzas thams cad las thar ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pas sbags pa dang bcas ba'i nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam pa lnga ni rdzas te /
analyzed: rdzas thams cad las thar ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pas sbags pa dang bcas ba'i nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam pa lnga ni rdzas te /
translated: Freedom from all substances refers to the five appropriated aggregates that are contaminated by ignorance and the mental afflictions.

original: rnam pa thams cad tu de dang bral bas thar ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad tu de dang bral bas thar ba'o //
translated: Since it is completely free from them, it is freedom.

original: sems kyi g-yeng ba thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams dang / rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: sems kyi g-yeng ba thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams dang / rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: The pacification of all mental distractions refers to the pacification of all the passions, such as passion, etc., which are the causes of distraction, and of all the conceptualizations.

original: de rnams rnam pa thams cad tu zhi ba ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams rnam pa thams cad tu zhi ba ni zhi ba'o //
translated: The pacification of all of these in every way is peace.

original: 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye ba'i gnas yin pas so //
analyzed: 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye ba'i gnas yin pas so //
translated: The source of all prosperity means that it is the source of all mundane and supramundane perfections.

original: rgud pa thams cad sel ba'o //
analyzed: rgud pa thams cad sel ba'o //
translated: It removes all misfortune

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i phun sum tshogs pa las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rgud pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i phun sum tshogs pa las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rgud pa ste /
translated: because it is the opposite of the perfections as they have been explained.

original: de'i phyir de @292b sel ba ni spong ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de @292b sel ba ni spong ba'o //
translated: Therefore, removing means eliminating.

original: ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni ngan song du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i las ni ngan song gi sgo ste /
analyzed: ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni ngan song du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i las ni ngan song gi sgo ste /
translated: It closes all the doors to the miserable realms because the karma that leads to the miserable realms is the door to the miserable realms.

original: de mi 'byed pas gcod par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de mi 'byed pas gcod par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It closes that because it does not open it.

original: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer 'thob pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer 'thob pa'i thabs te /
translated: The good path to the city of liberation is the means of attaining the city of nirvana.

original: de bas na de las lhag pa'i lam gzhan med pas na bzang po'o //
analyzed: de bas na de las lhag pa'i lam gzhan med pas na bzang po'o //
translated: Therefore, since there is no other path higher than that, it is good.

original: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la mi 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyu ni ma rig pa dang sred pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la mi 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyu ni ma rig pa dang sred pa ste /
translated: It does not engage the wheel of cyclic existence. The cause of the wheel of cyclic existence is ignorance and craving.

original: de dag chos bdag med par mthong bas rtsa ba nas bton pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag chos bdag med par mthong bas rtsa ba nas bton pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since those are uprooted by seeing the selflessness of phenomena, it does not engage the wheel of cyclic existence.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o zhes bya ba ni //
translated: It turns the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs nas sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs nas sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o //
translated: Having realized all phenomena in all their aspects, it turns the wheel of the Dharma in order to benefit countless sentient beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rnam par rgyal ba dang ba dan bsgreng ba ni ba dan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rnam par rgyal ba dang ba dan bsgreng ba ni ba dan te /
translated: The victory banner of the teachings of the Tathagatas is raised.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The victory banner is the victory banner of the realization of all dharmas.

original: dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba ni gnas ni byin gyi rlabs te /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba ni gnas ni byin gyi rlabs te /
translated: The abode of the teaching of the holy Dharma is the consecration.

original: chos thams cad ston pa la gegs byed pa bdud kyi dgra bo rnams tshar gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad ston pa la gegs byed pa bdud kyi dgra bo rnams tshar gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The consecration is the abode, because it destroys the enemies of Mara who obstruct the teaching of all dharmas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar sogs par sangs
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar sogs par sangs
translated: The swift accomplishment of the Bodhisattvas who practice the Mantra Vehicle is the accomplishment of the swift attainment of the Mantra Vehicle.

original: rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dngos grub myur du 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dngos grub myur du 'grub pa'o //
translated: The power of the bodhisattva who is intent on the realization of the perfection of wisdom is the swift accomplishment of the powers up to the perfection of the powers.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The realization of the bodhisattva who is intent on the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the direct realization of reality.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa nyams su myong ba mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med pa nyams su myong ba mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who is intent on the perfection of wisdom is the direct realization of the experience of the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: gnyis su med pa'i so sor rtogs par mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i so sor rtogs par mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'o //
translated: The perfection of the bodhisattva who is intent on the non-dual realization is the knowledge of all aspects. This is the excess.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs @293a * //üîΩpa ni yongs su dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs @293a * // pa ni yongs su dag par byed pa'o //
translated: The perfection of all the perfections and the stores is the complete perfection of all aspects.

original: sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The complete perfection of all the stages is the complete perfection of the perfections.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The realization of the four noble truths is from the point of view of the bodhisattvas,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no //üîΩchos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyis sems kyi skad cig ma gcig nyid la chos thams cad khong du chud pas na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no // chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyis sems kyi skad cig ma gcig nyid la chos thams cad khong du chud pas na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
translated: not from the point of view of the arhats.

original: bzhi'i rim pas rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi'i rim pas rtogs pa ste /
translated: The realization of the applications of mindfulness of all things by means of a single mental state is the realization of the four applications of mindfulness by means of a single moment of mind, since all things are of one taste.

original: bslab pa'i gnas skabs kyi rim pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gnas skabs kyi rim pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not by the stages of the levels of training.

original: phan yon re re nas mang du bstan pas ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: phan yon re re nas mang du bstan pas ci zhig bya ste /
translated: What is the use of teaching the benefits one by one?

original: re re nas smras na bskal pa bye ba'i bar du yang mthar thug par bya bar mi nus so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: re re nas smras na bskal pa bye ba'i bar du yang mthar thug par bya bar mi nus so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that even in ten million eons one by one it is not possible to reach the end,

original: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThis recitation of the name completely perfects all the qualities of the Buddha.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs can no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs can no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning is that it has the nature of the qualities of all the Buddhas.

original: // / da ni mthong ba'i chos can gyi dge ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni mthong ba'i chos can gyi dge ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the benefits such as the increase of virtue in this life and the attainment of pleasant results,

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: VajrapƒÅ·πái, the bearer of the vajra, says ‚ÄúMoreover,‚Äù and so on.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di klog pa dang 'don pa la sogs pas yid la byas na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun du spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhesüîΩbya ba ste /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di klog pa dang 'don pa la sogs pas yid la byas na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun du spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If one mentally engages in this recitation of the names as explained, by reading it, reciting it, and so forth, it will completely pacify all the misdeeds of body, speech, and mind of all sentient beings.

original: kun du spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sdig pa rnams sel zhing ril gyis rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes don gyi dbang gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sdig pa rnams sel zhing ril gyis rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes don gyi dbang gis shes par bya'o //
translated: This means that the misdeeds that are the nature of conduct will be removed and completely uprooted.

original: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang yi dags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par sbyong bar byed pa yin pas na ngan song sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang yi dags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par sbyong bar byed pa yin pas na ngan song sbyong ba ste /
translated: It purifies all the lower rebirths of all sentient beings means that it purifies the karma that would cause one to enter the hells, the realm of hungry ghosts, and the animal realm.

original: rnam par sbyong ba ni dngos po med pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par sbyong ba ni dngos po med pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
translated: Purification is taught to be the absence of real things.

original: ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is the averter of all miserable states of existence means

original: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that it averts the karma leading to miserable states of existence.

original: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang @293b dag pa gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag tu 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnams mi dmigs par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang @293b dag pa gcod pa'o zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag tu 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnams mi dmigs par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the thorough elimination of all karmic obscurations means that it teaches the non-apprehension of the afflictions of self and self-binding, such as desire, hatred, and delusion, and karmic obscurations.

original: mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par spong bar ston pa dmyal ba dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gro dang / mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo dang /
analyzed: mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par spong bar ston pa dmyal ba dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gro dang / mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo dang /
translated: It is the non-production of the stream of birth in all eight inopportune states means that it teaches the abandonment of the ten unwholesome courses of action, such as hell beings, hungry ghosts, animals, barbarians,

original: lha tshe ring po rnams su skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / med par lta ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba ste /
analyzed: lha tshe ring po rnams su skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / med par lta ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba ste /
translated: they are born among the long-lived gods, they are born in buddha-realms where buddhas do not appear, such as in the absence of the faculties and in the view of nihilism.

original: de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are born in places where these do not exist.

original: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang / glang po che myos pa dang / me drag po 'bar ba'i tshogs can rnam par 'phro ba dang / dug rnam par 'phro bas bsgyings pa'i sprul dang /
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang / glang po che myos pa dang / me drag po 'bar ba'i tshogs can rnam par 'phro ba dang / dug rnam par 'phro bas bsgyings pa'i sprul dang /
translated: They pacify the eight great fears means that they pacify the fear of lions, crazed elephants, the spreading flames of a great fire,üîΩthe spreading poison of a snake, the fear of a rakshasa with hair standing up and wild eyes, the fear of thieves with a multitude of weapons that are hard and sharp,

original: skra dang kha spu kham pa gyen du brdzes pa mig gtum pa'i srin po dang mtshon cha'i tshogs sra zhing rno ba'i rkun po dang / brtson srung dang lcags sgrog gis kun du dkrugs pa'i rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / dba' rlabs kun du 'khrug pa'i chu dang /
analyzed: skra dang kha spu kham pa gyen du brdzes pa mig gtum pa'i srin po dang mtshon cha'i tshogs sra zhing rno ba'i rkun po dang / brtson srung dang lcags sgrog gis kun du dkrugs pa'i rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / dba' rlabs kun du 'khrug pa'i chu dang /
translated: the fear of a king who is agitated by spies and shackles, the fear of water that is agitated by waves,

original: sha za'i 'jigs pa rnams la dran pa tsam gyis rnam par thar par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sha za'i 'jigs pa rnams la dran pa tsam gyis rnam par thar par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because merely by remembering it, one is liberated from the fear of flesh-eating spirits.

original: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par 'jig par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par 'jig par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It definitely destroys all bad dreams.

original: rmi lam gang gis yid du mi 'ong ba ston pa ni rmi lam ngan pa ste /
analyzed: rmi lam gang gis yid du mi 'ong ba ston pa ni rmi lam ngan pa ste /
translated: A bad dream is one that shows something unpleasant.

original: de 'jig par byed pa ni gzhig ba'i bsam pas lan cig bklags pa tsam ma /
analyzed: de 'jig par byed pa ni gzhig ba'i bsam pas lan cig bklags pa tsam ma /
translated: It destroys that, in the sense of removing it, merely by being recited once, with the intention of destroying it.

original: dran pa tsam gyis 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: It destroys it merely by being remembered.üîΩIt definitely removes all inauspicious omens.

original: ltas ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni ce spyang sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa yid du mi 'ong ba skyed par byed pa ni ltas ngan pa ste /
analyzed: ltas ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni ce spyang sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa yid du mi 'ong ba skyed par byed pa ni ltas ngan pa ste /
translated: An inauspicious omen is something that produces something unpleasant, such as the howling of a jackal.

original: de yang bklags pa tsam mam dran pa tsam gyis sel bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bklags pa tsam mam dran pa tsam gyis sel bar byed pa yin no //
translated: It removes that, merely by being recited or merely by being remembered.

original: brdangs  dang bgegs thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni brdangs  ston pa dang bgegs rnams gus pa dang bcas te bklags pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brdangs  dang bgegs thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni brdangs  ston pa dang bgegs rnams gus pa dang bcas te bklags pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It pacifies all obstacles and hindrances means that by reciting it with respect, the obstacles are pacified.

original: bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du spong bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas bklags pas so //
analyzed: bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du spong bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas bklags pas so //
translated: It removes all the works of the enemy Mara means that by reciting it with the realization of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa rnams @294a * //
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa rnams @294a * //
translated: It increases all roots of virtue and merit means that by reciting and chanting it, one enters into the roots of virtue that are characterized by the absence of attachment, hatred, and delusion.

original: la bklags pa dang / bton pa la sogs pa byas pas gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: la bklags pa dang / bton pa la sogs pa byas pas gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It increases them more and more.

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa sngon du 'gro ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa sngon du 'gro ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa ste /
translated: All improper mental activity is prevented from arising. Improper mental activity is preceded by the notional attachment to ‚ÄòI‚Äô and ‚Äòmine‚Äô.

original: lam la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lam la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mind that has the path as its object does not arise.

original: de chos la bdag med par ston pa'i de kho na nyid yid la byed cing rgyun du bklags pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de chos la bdag med par ston pa'i de kho na nyid yid la byed cing rgyun du bklags pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: He pacifies it by means of the mental attention to reality which reveals the selflessness of dharmas and by means of constant study.

original: rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs dang nor dang shes rab la sogs pas sems mtho bar 'gyur ba ni rgyags pa'o //
analyzed: rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs dang nor dang shes rab la sogs pas sems mtho bar 'gyur ba ni rgyags pa'o //
translated: He completely destroys all pride, conceit, arrogance and egoism. Conceit is the elevation of the mind on account of one‚Äôs family, wealth, wisdom and so on.

original: nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: Conceit is of seven kinds, as previously explained.

original: dregs pa ni nga dang mnyam pa med do zhes khengs pa ste /
analyzed: dregs pa ni nga dang mnyam pa med do zhes khengs pa ste /
translated: Arrogance is the inflation of the mind with the thought: ‚ÄòThere is no one equal to me‚Äô.

original: de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni ngar 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni ngar 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: The root of all of them is the adherence to the belief in a self.

original: de yang sgyu ma lta bu dang dngos po med pa nyid du khong du chud par ston pas so //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma lta bu dang dngos po med pa nyid du khong du chud par ston pas so //
translated: And that is taught to be like an illusion and to be non-existent.

original: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i dga' ston gyi zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i dga' ston gyi zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the non-arising of all suffering and mental unhappiness, because it overwhelms with the festival of joy that comes from understanding reality.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is the essence of all the Tathagatas, because it is the nature of the wisdom of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin la /
translated: The wisdom of emptiness is the essence of all the Tathagatas.

original: de ston pa'i yi ge'i bye brag kyang snying po yin te /
analyzed: de ston pa'i yi ge'i bye brag kyang snying po yin te /
translated: And the particular letters that teach that are also the essence,

original: de gnyi ga'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both of them are devoid of an essence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni skal pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sla bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni skal pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sla bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the secret of all bodhisattvas, because it is not easily understood by sentient beings who are not fortunate.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu yid rton pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu yid rton pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great secret of all ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas, because it is the basis of supreme confidence.

original: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is the seal of all seals, the mantra of all mantras, the gesture of all gestures.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgyas kyang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad kyang 'debs pas na phyag rgya thams cad du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgyas kyang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad kyang 'debs pas na phyag rgya thams cad du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the seal of all seals, because it seals the entire divine wheel with the great seal, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal.

original: snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags dang / phreng ba'i gsang sngags la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags dang / phreng ba'i gsang sngags la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the essence of all mantras because it is the essence, the quintessence, the root mantra, the garland mantra, and so on.

original: chos thams cad @294b brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos thams cad @294b brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is the perfect generation of mindfulness and vigilance for those who speak of the inexpressibility of all phenomena.

original: dran pa ni chos la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi cha dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni chos la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi cha dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Mindfulness is the aspect of wisdom that takes phenomena as its object.

original: shes bzhin ni dran pas 'jog pa'i dngos po rnams la brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes bzhin ni dran pas 'jog pa'i dngos po rnams la brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'o //
translated: Vigilance is the cultivation of stability in the things that are established by mindfulness.

original: bla na med pa'i shes rab bskyed pa dang / yid gzhungs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung dang don la dpyod cing rnam par 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / nges par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid can ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i shes rab bskyed pa dang / yid gzhungs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung dang don la dpyod cing rnam par 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / nges par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid can ni shes rab bo //
translated: It generates unsurpassed wisdom and makes the mind sharp. The nature of wisdom is to analyze and discern the texts and their meanings, and it has the nature of differentiation.

original: gzhung 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ni yid gzhungs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhung 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ni yid gzhungs pa ste /
translated: The nature of a ruler is a sharp mind.

original: shes rab dang yid gzhungs pa de las lhan cig gong mar gyur pa med pas na bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang yid gzhungs pa de las lhan cig gong mar gyur pa med pas na bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o //
translated: Since there is nothing higher than wisdom and a sharp mind, it causes unsurpassed wisdom and a sharp mind.

original: nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems las gnod pa sel bar byed pa'i nus pa phul du byung ba bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir nad med pa'o //
analyzed: nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems las gnod pa sel bar byed pa'i nus pa phul du byung ba bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir nad med pa'o //
translated: It causes the perfection of health, strength, and sovereignty. Health is the ability to eliminate harm to the body and mind.

original: yang ba dang / phra ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / bdag por gyur pa dang / dbang phyug tu gyur pa dang / gar yang phyin pa dang / 'dod dgur ldan pa dang / dga' dgur gnas pa ste /
analyzed: yang ba dang / phra ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / bdag por gyur pa dang / dbang phyug tu gyur pa dang / gar yang phyin pa dang / 'dod dgur ldan pa dang / dga' dgur gnas pa ste /
translated: It causes the perfection of the eight masteries: lightness, subtlety, worship, sovereignty, lordship, going anywhere, possessing anything, and abiding anywhere.

original: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad phun sum tshogs par byed pa'am /
analyzed: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad phun sum tshogs par byed pa'am /
translated: It causes the perfection of the eight masteries of qualities.

original: yang na phyi dang nang gi bdag por gyur pa la phul du byung bar byed pas dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na phyi dang nang gi bdag por gyur pa la phul du byung bar byed pas dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is the perfection of sovereignty, since it causes the attainment of sovereignty over the internal and external.

original: dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It causes the increase of glory, virtue, peace, and excellence.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs ni dpal lo //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs ni dpal lo //
translated: The accumulation of merit is glory.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs ni dge ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs ni dge ba'o //
translated: The accumulation of wisdom is virtue.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ldog pa ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ldog pa ni zhi ba'o //
translated: The cessation of all moral defilement and secondary defilement is peace.

original: 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ni legs pa ste /
analyzed: 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ni legs pa ste /
translated: Nirvana through the attainment of Buddhahood is excellence.

original: de dag ma lus pa'i rab kyi mthar thug par 'dren par byed pas dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ma lus pa'i rab kyi mthar thug par 'dren par byed pas dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: It causes the increase of glory, virtue, peace and excellence, since it leads to the ultimate perfection of all of these.

original: grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa grags par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa phul du byung ba las byung ba ni grags pa'o //
analyzed: grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa grags par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa phul du byung ba las byung ba ni grags pa'o //
translated: It causes fame, renown, praise and acclaim. Fame arises from the excellence of generosity.

original: ye shes phul du byung ba las byung ba ni snyan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes phul du byung ba las byung ba ni snyan pa'o //
translated: The pleasing is that which arises from the most excellent intuition.

original: yon tan thams cad phul du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni tshigs su bcad pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad phul du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni tshigs su bcad pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The extensive is that which has the nature of the most excellent of all virtues.

original: rnam pa thams cad du mchod par 'os pas ni bstod pa rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes rnam par dbye'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mchod par 'os pas ni bstod pa rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes rnam par dbye'o //

analyzed: shin tu dag byed rnams kyi yang shin tu dag byed kyang yin te /

translated: Because the stainless intuition of the TathƒÅgata purifies all sentient beings.

original: 'khra sa med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa bla na med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa shes pa la rmongs pa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lam sgrub pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khra sa med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa bla na med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa shes pa la rmongs pa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lam sgrub pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: blang ba dang dor ba'i dngos po'i bye brag byed pa'i shes rab nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dag ni dor ba'o //
